caption.title: Morphology characterization.
caption.p: (a) Low - and (b) high-magnification SEM images of Fe 2O 3/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures. (c) Low - and high-magnification (inset) TEM images of Fe 2O 3/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures. (d) HRTEM image and fast-Fourier transformation (FFT) of the Fe 2O 3 nanorod surface.
